strings.PLACEHOLDER_NO_SERVERS: You do not have any saved servers. Press "Add Server" to add a server.
strings.ERROR_SESSION_CREATION_COOLDOWN: Please wait a moment before attempting to log in again
strings.ERROR_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_ONLINE: The account is already online on another device
strings.ItemType:desc/KENDAL_DYNAMICS_SCOUT: The newest generation of Kendal Dynamics' quadropedic spider robots. It's small size and low weight make it ideal for situations where high agility is of the utmost importance.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_1030: The lowest performance processor of the BIGTON 10XX series. BIGTON 10XX processors support only the bare essentials.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_1050: The mid-range processor of the BIGTON 10XX series. BIGTON 10XX processors support only the bare essentials.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_1070: The highest performance processor of the BIGTON 10XX series. BIGTON 10XX processors support only the bare essentials.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_2030: The lowest performance processor of the BIGTON 20XX series. In addition to the bare essentials, BIGTON 20XX processors also support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, making it a perfect fit for most use cases.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_2050: The mid-range processor of the BIGTON 20XX series. In addition to the bare essentials, BIGTON 20XX processors also support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, making it a perfect fit for most use cases.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_2070: The highest performance processor of the BIGTON 20XX series. In addition to the bare essentials, BIGTON 20XX processors also support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, making it a perfect fit for most use cases.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_3030: The lowest performance processor of the BIGTON 30XX series. BIGTON 30XX processors not only support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, but also include a floating point unit, allowing them to process IEEE-754 double floats. This makes the BIGTON 30XX processors a perfect fit for any use case.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_3050: The mid-range processor of the BIGTON 30XX series. BIGTON 30XX processors not only support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, but also include a floating point unit, allowing them to process IEEE-754 double floats. This makes the BIGTON 30XX processors a perfect fit for any use case.
strings.ItemType:desc/BIGTON_3070: The highest performance processor of the BIGTON 30XX series. BIGTON 30XX processors not only support memory expensansions, dynamic memory allocations and custom function definitions, but also include a floating point unit, allowing them to process IEEE-754 double floats. This makes the BIGTON 30XX processors a perfect fit for any use case.
strings.ItemType:desc/PIVOTAL_ME2048: The Pivotal ME2048 is a memory expansion unit, compatible with any BIGTON 20XX and 30XX series processor. This particular unit adds 2 kilobytes of random access memory to your system.
strings.ItemType:desc/PIVOTAL_ME5120: The Pivotal ME5120 is a memory expansion unit, compatible with any BIGTON 20XX and 30XX series processor. This particular unit adds 5 kilobytes of random access memory to your system.
strings.ItemType:desc/PIVOTAL_ME10K: The Pivotal ME10K is a memory expansion unit, compatible with any BIGTON 20XX and 30XX series processor. This particular unit adds 10 kilobytes of random access memory to your system.
strings.ItemType:desc/PIVOTAL_ME20K: The Pivotal ME20K is a memory expansion unit, compatible with any BIGTON 20XX and 30XX series processor. This particular unit adds 20 kilobytes of random access memory to your system.
